import styles from './MovieCard.module.scss' import AddToFavorites from '../AddToFavorites/AddToFavorites'; import { StarOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import Link from 'next/link' function MovieCard({ title, id, release_date, overview, vote_average }) { return (

{title}

overview

{overview}

{vote_average}

Release date

{release_date}

) } export default MovieCard;
